summary.span: Represents a writer that provides a fast, non-cached, forward-only way to generate streams or files that contain XML data.

span.span: Represents a writer that provides a fast, non-cached, forward-only way to generate streams or files that contain XML data.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 類別會將 XML 資料寫入資料流、 檔案、 文字讀取器或字串。The class writes XML data to a stream, file, text reader, or string. 它支援 W3C[可延伸標記語言 (XML) 1.0 （第四版）](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/)和[XML 1.0 中的命名空間 （第三個版本）](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/)建議。It supports the W3C [Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 (fourth edition)](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/) and [Namespaces in XML 1.0 (third edition)](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/) recommendations. 成員類別可讓您：The members of the class enable you to: - 驗證字元是否為合法 XML 字元，以及項目與屬性名稱是否為有效的 XML 名稱。Verify that the characters are legal XML characters and that element and attribute names are valid XML names. - 驗證 XML 文件的格式是否正確。Verify that the XML document is well-formed. - 將二進位資料編碼為 Base64 或 BinHex，並寫出產生的文字。Encode binary bytes as Base64 or BinHex, and write out the resulting text. - 若要避免需要手動執行值的轉換，而不是字串，使用 common language runtime 類型傳遞值。Pass values by using common language runtime types instead of strings, to avoid having to manually perform value conversions. - 將多份文件寫至一個輸出資料流。Write multiple documents to one output stream. - 寫入有效的名稱、限定名稱，以及名稱語彙基元。Write valid names, qualified names, and name tokens. 本節內容：In this section: [建立 XML 寫入器](#create) [Creating an XML writer](#create) [指定的輸出格式](#output) [Specifying the output format](#output) [資料一致性](#conformance) [Data conformance](#conformance) [寫入項目](#writing_elements) [Writing elements](#writing_elements) [寫入屬性](#writing_attributes) [Writing attributes](#writing_attributes) [處理命名空間](#handling_ns) [Handling namespaces](#handling_ns) [寫入具型別資料](#writing_types) [Writing typed data](#writing_types) [關閉的 XML 寫入器](#close) [Closing the XML writer](#close) [非同步程式設計](#async) [Asynchronous programming](#async) [安全性考量Security considerations](#security) ## 建立 XML 寫入器Creating an XML writer 若要建立執行個體，使用方法。To create an instance, use the method. 指定您想要的 XML 寫入器上啟用的功能的設定，傳遞至方法。To specify the set of features you want to enable on the XML writer, pass an to the method. 否則，會使用預設設定。Otherwise, default settings are used. 請參閱參考頁面的詳細資料。See the reference pages for details. ## 指定的輸出格式Specifying the output format 類別包含數個屬性可控制如何輸出格式：The class includes several properties that control how output is formatted: |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||指定要使用的文字編碼方式。Specifies the text encoding to use. 預設值為 `Encoding.UTF8`。The default is `Encoding.UTF8`.| ||表示是否縮排項目。Indicates whether to indent elements. 預設值是`false`（沒有縮排）。The default is `false` (no indentation).| ||指定縮排時要使用的字元字串。Specifies the character string to use when indenting. 預設值為兩個空格。The default is two spaces.| ||指定用於分行符號的字元字串。Specifies the character string to use for line breaks. 預設值為 `\r\n` (歸位字元、換行字元)。The default is `\r\n` (carriage return, line feed).| ||指定如何處理新行字元。Specifies how to handle newline characters.| ||表示是否要在新行上寫入屬性。Indicates whether to write attributes on a new line. 使用此屬性時，應將 設為 `true`。 should be set to `true` when using this property. 預設值為 `false`。The default is `false`.| ||表示是否撰寫 XML 宣告。Indicates whether to write an XML declaration. 預設值為 `false`。The default is `false`.| 及 屬性控制如何格式化非顯著泛空白字元。The and properties control how insignificant white space is formatted. 例如，若要縮排元素節點：For example, to indent element nodes: [!code-csharp[XmlWriter_v2#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter_v2/CS/writer_v2.cs#8)] [!code-vb[XmlWriter_v2#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter_v2/VB/writer_v2.vb#8)] 使用利用縮排一個額外層級的新行上撰寫每個屬性：Use the to write each attribute on a new line with one extra level of indentation: [!code-csharp[XmlWriter_v2#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter_v2/CS/writer_v2.cs#9)] [!code-vb[XmlWriter_v2#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter_v2/VB/writer_v2.vb#9)] ## 資料一致性Data conformance XML 寫入器會使用兩個屬性，從資料一致性檢查的類別：An XML writer uses two properties from the class to check for data conformance: - 屬性會指示檢查的字元，而且會擲回的 XML 寫入器如果任何字元都是在合法的範圍之外，如 W3C 所定義的例外狀況。The property instructs the XML writer to check characters and throw an exception if any characters are outside the legal range, as defined by the W3C. - 屬性會設定要檢查正在寫入的資料流符合規則的語式正確的 XML 1.0 文件或文件片段，如 W3C 所定義的 XML 寫入器。The property configures the XML writer to check that the stream being written complies with the rules for a well-formed XML 1.0 document or document fragment, as defined by the W3C. 下表中詳述的三個一致性層級。The three conformance levels are described in the following table. 預設值為 。The default is . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱屬性和列舉型別。For details, see the property and the enumeration. |層級Level|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||XML 輸出符合格式正確的 XML 1.0 版文件的規則，而且可以由任何合格的處理器來處理。The XML output conforms to the rules for a well-formed XML 1.0 document and can be processed by any conforming processor.| ||XML 輸出符合格式正確的 XML 1.0 版文件片段的規則。The XML output conforms to the rules for a well-formed XML 1.0 document fragment.| ||XML 寫入器會決定包含要套用檢查 （文件或片段） 根據內送資料的層級。The XML writer determines which level of conformation checking to apply (document or fragment) based on the incoming data.| ## 寫入項目Writing elements 您可以使用下列方法來寫入項目節點。You can use the following methods to write element nodes. 如需範例，請參閱所列的方法。For examples, see the methods listed. |使用Use|以To| |---------|--------| ||編寫整個項目節點，其中包括字串值。Write an entire element node, including a string value.| ||若要使用多個方法呼叫，以寫入項目值。To write an element value by using multiple method calls. 例如，您可以呼叫 寫入具型別值、呼叫 寫入字元實體、呼叫 寫入屬性，或者可以寫入項目子系。For example, you can call to write a typed value, to write a character entity, to write an attribute, or you can write a child element. 這是更趨精密完美的版本方法。This is a more sophisticated version of the method.

若要關閉項目，請呼叫或方法。To close the element, you call the or method.| ||若要複製項目節點的目前位置找到或物件。To copy an element node found at the current position of an or object. 呼叫此方法時，它會將來源物件中的所有內容複製到 執行個體。When called, it copies everything from the source object to the instance.| ## 寫入屬性Writing attributes 您可以使用下列方法來寫入項目節點上的屬性。You can use the following methods to write attributes on element nodes. 這些方法也可用來建立命名空間宣告項目，在下一節中所述。These methods can also be used to create namespace declarations on an element, as discussed in the next section. |使用Use|以To| |---------|--------| ||要寫入整個屬性節點，其中包括字串值。To write an entire attribute node, including a string value.| ||若要撰寫使用多個方法呼叫的屬性值。To write the attribute value using multiple method calls. 例如，您可以呼叫寫入具類型的值。For example, you can call to write a typed value. 這是更趨精密完美的版本方法。This is a more sophisticated version of the method.

若要關閉項目，請呼叫方法。To close the element, you call the method.| ||若要在目前的位置找到的所有屬性都複製物件。To copy all the attributes found at the current position of an object. 寫入的屬性取決於讀取器目前所在的節點的類型：The attributes that are written depend on the type of node the reader is currently positioned on:

-若為屬性節點，它會將目前的屬性，然後其餘屬性寫入結尾標記的項目之前。- For an attribute node, it writes the current attribute, and then the rest of the attributes until the element closing tag.
-若為項目節點，它會寫入元素所包含的所有屬性。- For an element node, it writes all attributes contained by the element.
-若為 XML 宣告節點，它會寫入所有屬性宣告中。- For an XML declaration node, it writes all the attributes in the declaration.
-若為所有其他節點型別，方法會擲回例外狀況。- For all other node types, the method throws an exception.| ## 處理命名空間Handling namespaces 命名空間用於對 XML 文件中的項目與屬性名稱進行限定。Namespaces are used to qualify element and attribute names in an XML document. 命名空間前置詞將關聯的命名空間，而接著相關聯的 URI 參考的項目和屬性。Namespace prefixes associate elements and attributes with namespaces, which are in turn associated with URI references. 命名空間會在 XML 文件中建立項目和屬性名稱唯一性。Namespaces create element and attribute name uniqueness in an XML document. 維護命名空間堆疊，對應至目前的命名空間範圍中定義的所有命名空間。The maintains a namespace stack that corresponds to all the namespaces defined in the current namespace scope. 當寫入項目及屬性時，可透過下列方式利用命名空間：When writing elements and attributes you can utilize namespaces in the following ways: - 宣告命名空間，以手動方式使用方法。Declare namespaces manually by using the method. 當知道如何最佳化命名空間宣告數目時，這便會很有用。This can be useful when you know how to best optimize the number of namespace declarations. 如需範例，請參閱方法。For an example, see the method. - 使用新的命名空間覆寫目前的命名空間宣告。Override the current namespace declaration with a new namespace. 下列程式碼，方法變更命名空間 URI 的`"x"`前置詞`"123"`至`"abc"`。In the following code, the method changes the namespace URI for the `"x"` prefix from `"123"` to `"abc"`. [!code-csharp[XmlWriter_v2#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter_v2/CS/writer_v2.cs#18)] [!code-vb[XmlWriter_v2#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter_v2/VB/writer_v2.vb#18)] 程式碼會產生下列 XML 字串：The code generates the following XML string: ```xml ``` - 寫入屬性或項目時，指定命名空間前置詞。Specify a namespace prefix when writing attributes or elements. 許多用來寫入項目和屬性的方法可讓您執行這項操作。Many of the methods used to write element and attributes enable you to do this. 例如，方法寫入的開頭標記，並將它與指定的命名空間與前置詞產生關聯。For example, the method writes a start tag and associates it with a specified namespace and prefix. ## 寫入具型別資料Writing typed data 方法可接受的 common language runtime (CLR) 物件、 將輸入的值轉換為其字串表示，根據 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 資料類型轉換規則，並將它編寫寫入使用方法。The method accepts a common language runtime (CLR) object, converts the input value to its string representation according to XML schema definition language (XSD) data type conversion rules, and writes it out by using the method. 這是比使用中的方法更容易類別，以寫出之前，將具類型的資料轉換成字串值。This is easier than using the methods in the class to convert the typed data to a string value before writing it out. 寫入文字，具類型的值序列化為文字使用該結構描述類型的規則。When writing to text, the typed value is serialized to text by using the rules for that schema type. 預設 XSD 資料型別對應至 CLR 型別，請參閱方法。For default XSD data types that correspond to CLR types, see the method. 也可用來寫入 XML 資料存放區。The can also be used to write to an XML data store. 例如， 類別可以建立 物件，以建立 物件的節點。For example, the class can create an object to create nodes for an object. 如果資料存放區的結構描述資訊可用，方法擲回例外狀況，如果您嘗試轉換成不允許的類型。如果資料存放區並沒有結構描述資訊提供給它，方法會將所有的值視為`xsd:anySimpleType`型別。If the data store has schema information available to it, the method throws an exception if you try to convert to a type that is not allowed.If the data store does not have schema information available to it, the method treats all values as an `xsd:anySimpleType` type. ## 關閉的 XML 寫入器Closing the XML writer 當您使用輸出 XML 的元素和屬性的方法不會寫入，直到您呼叫方法。When you use methods to output XML, the elements and attributes are not written until you call the method. 例如，如果您使用填入物件，您將無法看到寫入的元素和屬性的目標文件中，直到您關閉執行個體。For example, if you are using to populate an object, you won't be able to see the written elements and attributes in the target document until you close the instance. ## 非同步程式設計Asynchronous programming 大部分的方法都有非同步的對應具有"Async"結尾的方法名稱。Most of the methods have asynchronous counterparts that have "Async" at the end of their method names. 例如，非同步的對等是。For example, the asynchronous equivalent of is . 如方法，沒有非同步的對應項目，將傳回的值轉換為字串，然後再使用方法改為。For the method, which doesn't have an asynchronous counterpart, convert the return value to a string and use the method instead. ## 安全性考量Security considerations 使用時，請考慮下列類別：Consider the following when working with the class: - 擲回例外狀況可以揭露您不想要的路徑資訊反昇至應用程式。Exceptions thrown by the can disclose path information that you do not want bubbled up to the app. 您的應用程式必須捕捉例外狀況，並予以適當處理。Your app must catch exceptions and process them appropriately. - 不會驗證傳遞至任何資料或方法。 does not validate any data that is passed to the or method. 您不應該對這些方法傳遞任意資料。You should not pass arbitrary data to these methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用非同步 API 來產生 XML。The following example code shows how to use the asynchronous API to generate XML. ```csharp async Task TestWriter(Stream stream) { XmlWriterSettings settings = new XmlWriterSettings(); settings.Async = true; using (XmlWriter writer = XmlWriter.Create(stream, settings)) { await writer.WriteStartElementAsync("pf", "root", "http://ns"); await writer.WriteStartElementAsync(null, "sub", null); await writer.WriteAttributeStringAsync(null, "att", null, "val"); await writer.WriteStringAsync("text"); await writer.WriteEndElementAsync(); await writer.WriteProcessingInstructionAsync("pName", "pValue"); await writer.WriteCommentAsync("cValue"); await writer.WriteCDataAsync("cdata value"); await writer.WriteEndElementAsync(); await writer.FlushAsync(); } } ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自動關閉任何項目或屬性保持開啟狀態。Any elements or attributes left open are automatically closed. > [!NOTE] > 當您使用將不會寫入到輸出 XML 的元素和屬性的方法，直到您呼叫方法。When you use the methods to output XML, the elements and attributes will not be written until you call the method. 例如，如果您要使用 XmlWriter 填入，除非您關閉，不能觀察目標文件中的屬性與寫入的項目。For example, if you are using the XmlWriter to populate an , until you close the , you will not be able to observe the written elements and attributes in the target document. ## Examples 下列範例會寫入 XML 節點。The following example writes an XML node. [!code-cpp[XmlWriter.Close#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter.Close/CPP/XmlWriter.Close.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlWriter.Close#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter.Close/CS/writeelems.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlWriter.Close#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter.Close/VB/writeelems.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 部分多載包括`settings`參數可接受物件。Some of the overloads include a `settings` parameter that accepts an object. 您可以使用此物件來：You can use this object to: - 指定要在建立支援哪些功能物件。Specify which features you want supported on the created object. - 重複使用物件來建立多個寫入器物件。Reuse the object to create multiple writer objects. 複製每個已建立之寫入器的 物件，並標示為唯讀。The object is copied and marked read-only for each created writer. 對 執行個體上設定的變更不會影響具有相同設定的現有寫入器。Changes to the settings on an instance do not affect existing writers with the same settings. 因此，您可以使用相同設定來建立具有相同功能的多個寫入器。Thus, you can use the same settings to create multiple writers with the same functionality. 或者，您可以修改 執行個體上的設定，並建立具有一組不同功能的新寫入器。Or, you can modify the settings on an instance and create a new writer with a different set of features. - 將功能加入現有的 XML 寫入器。Add features to an existing XML writer. 方法可以接受其他 物件。The method can accept another object. 基礎物件沒有建立靜態的 XML 寫入器方法。The underlying object does not have to be an XML writer created by the static method. 例如，您可以指定要加入其他功能的使用者定義 XML 寫入器。For example, you can specify a user-defined XML writer to add additional features to. - 充分利用功能較佳的一致性檢查和相容性，例如[XML 1.0 版建議事項](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/)只上可用的建立由靜態物件方法。Take full advantage of features such as better conformance checking and compliance to the [XML 1.0 recommendation](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/) that are available only on objects created by the static method. 如果您使用不接受的多載物件時，會使用下列預設寫入器設定：If you use a overload that doesn't accept an object, the following default writer settings are used: |設定Setting|預設Default| |-------------|-------------| ||`true`| ||`false`| ||| ||| ||`false`| ||兩個空格Two spaces| || （不移除） (no removal)| ||`\r\n` (歸位字元，新行)`\r\n` (carriage return, new line)| ||| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||| ||`true`| > [!NOTE] > 雖然.NET Framework 包含類別，是具象實作的類別，建議您建立所使用的執行個體方法。Although the .NET Framework includes the class, which is a concrete implementation of the class, we recommend that you create instances by using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您使用這個多載，物件，使用下列預設設定用來建立 XML 寫入器：When you use this overload, an object with the following default settings is used to create the XML writer: |設定Setting|預設Default| |-------------|-------------| ||`true`| ||`false`| ||| ||| ||`false`| ||兩個空格Two spaces| || （不移除） (no removal)| ||`\r\n` (歸位字元，新行)`\r\n` (carriage return, new line)| ||| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||| ||`true`| 如果您想要指定要在建立的寫入器上支援的功能，使用多載採用物件做為其引數，其中，並傳入物件的自訂設定。If you want to specify the features to support on the created writer, use an overload that takes an object as one of its arguments, and pass in an object with your custom settings. 此外，XmlWriter 一律會寫入位元組順序標記 (BOM) 到基礎資料流。不過，某些資料流必須不會有 BOM。Also, XmlWriter always writes a Byte Order Mark (BOM) to the underlying data stream; however, some streams must not have a BOM. 若要省略 BOM，建立新物件，並設定新的編碼屬性物件建構函式設為 false 的布林值。To omit the BOM, create a new object and set the Encoding property to be a new object with the Boolean value in the constructor set to false. ## Examples 下列範例會將 XML 片段寫入記憶體資料流。The following example writes an XML fragment to a memory stream. (它會使用多載，也會設定設定新的 XML 寫入器執行個體上。)(It uses the overload, which also configures the settings on the new XML writer instance.) remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果讀取器位於`element`節點`WriteAttributes`複製所有包含的屬性。If the reader is positioned on an `element` node `WriteAttributes` copies all the contained attributes. 如果讀取器位於`attribute` 節點，這個方法會寫入目前的屬性，則其餘屬性結尾標記的項目之前。If the reader is positioned on an `attribute` node, this method writes the current attribute, then the rest of the attributes until the element closing tag. 如果讀取器位於`XmlDeclaration` 節點，這個方法會寫入所有屬性宣告中。If the reader is positioned on an `XmlDeclaration` node, this method writes all the attributes in the declaration. 如果讀取器在任何其他節點類型，這個方法會擲回。If the reader is positioned on any other node type this method throws an . 如果這個方法會呼叫使用，以確保寫入時，會取代任何內容 （已展開的實體），可能會導致無效的文件格式正確的 XML。If this method is called using , to ensure well-formed XML any content (which has been expanded from the entities) that could result in an invalid document is replaced when written. 例如，如果屬性包含`>`已擴充，以確保正確格式的文件展開的實體 > 以寫出時，取代`>`。For example, if an attribute includes an `>` entity that has been expanded, to ensure a well-formed document the expanded > is replaced when written out with `>`. 這個方法的非同步版本，請參閱。For the asynchronous version of this method, see . ## Examples 下列範例將所有項目複製到輸出，將標記名稱變更為大寫，並將複製未變更的所有屬性。The following example copies all the elements to the output, changes the tag names to upper case, and copies all the attributes unchanged. [!code-cpp[XmlWriter.WriteAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter.WriteAttributes/CPP/writeattrs_v2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlWriter.WriteAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter.WriteAttributes/CS/writeattrs_v2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlWriter.WriteAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter.WriteAttributes/VB/writeattrs_v2.vb#1)] 此範例會使用該檔案，`test1.xml`作為輸入。The example uses the file, `test1.xml`, as input. remarks.format: ## Remarks `WriteAttributeString` 會執行下列動作：`WriteAttributeString` does the following: - 如果屬性值包含雙引號或單一引號，取代了它們`"`和`'`分別。If the attribute value includes double or single quotes, they are replaced with `"` and `'` respectively. - 如果撰寫`xml:space`屬性寫入器會驗證屬性值是否有效。If writing an `xml:space` attribute, the writer verifies the attribute value is valid. (有效值為`preserve`或`default`。)(Valid values are `preserve` or `default`.) - 如果撰寫`xml:lang`屬性寫入器不會驗證屬性值是根據 W3C XML 1.0 recommendation 有效。If writing an `xml:lang` attribute, the writer does not verify that the attribute value is valid according to the W3C XML 1.0 recommendation. 這個方法的非同步版本，請參閱。For the asynchronous version of this method, see . ## Examples 下列範例會寫出活頁簿。The following example writes out a book. remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，位元組緩衝區可能包含 GIF 影像的二進位內容。For example, the byte buffer may contain the binary contents of a GIF image. 這顯然不是有效的 XML。This clearly would not be valid XML. `Base64`編碼方式設計來代表任意位元組序列組成 65 US-ASCII 字元以文字形式 ([A-a-za-z0-9 + =])，每個字元都會編碼的二進位資料的 6 位元。The `Base64` encoding is designed to represent arbitrary byte sequences in a text form comprised of the 65 US-ASCII characters ([A-Za-z0-9+/=]) where each character encodes 6 bits of the binary data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱要求建議 (RFC) 位於 1521年[註解的網站要求](https://www.rfc-editor.org)。For more information, see Requests for Comments (RFC) 1521 located on the [Request for Comments Web site](https://www.rfc-editor.org). 這個方法的非同步版本，請參閱。For the asynchronous version of this method, see . ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法寫入`Base64`資料。The following example uses the method to write `Base64` data. `Base64`資料內嵌於``項目。The `Base64` data is embedded within an `` element. remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表顯示支援的節點型別，此方法。The following table shows the supported node types for this method. |NodeTypeNodeType|WriteNode 行為WriteNode Behavior| |--------------|------------------------| |`None`|寫出不論類型為何的所有節點。Writes out all the nodes irrespective of type. 也就是寫入器會消耗並寫出所有節點讀取包括屬性、 處理指示、 註解等等。That is, the writer consumes the and writes out all the nodes read including attributes, processing instructions, comments, and so on.

發生這種情況時處於初始狀態。This situation occurs when the is in an initial state. (屬性會傳回`ReaderState.Initial`)。(The property returns `ReaderState.Initial`).| |`Element`|寫出項目節點和任何屬性節點。Writes out the element node and any attribute nodes.| |`Attribute`|無作業。No operation. 請改用 或 。Use or instead.| |`Text`|寫出文字節點。Writes out the text node.| |`CDATA`|寫出 CDATA 區段節點。Writes out the CDATA section node.| |`EntityReference`|寫出實體參考節點。Writes out the entity reference node.| |`ProcessingInstruction`|寫出處理指示節點。Writes out the processing instruction node.| |`Comment`|寫出註解節點。Writes out the comment node.| |`DocumentType`|寫出文件類型節點。Writes out the document type node.| |`SignificantWhitespace`|寫出顯著泛空白字元節點。Writes out the significant white space node.| |`Whitespace`|寫出泛空白字元節點。Writes out the white space node.| |`EndElement`|寫出結尾項目標記。Writes out the end element tag.| |`EndEntity`|無作業。No operation.| |`XmlDeclaration`|寫出 XML 宣告節點。Writes out the XML declaration node.| 如果讀取器中的初始狀態，這個方法會將讀取器移至檔案結尾。If the reader is in the initial state, this method moves the reader to the end of file. 如果讀取器已經在檔案結尾，或處於已關閉狀態，這個方法是無法操作。If the reader is already at the end of file or in a closed state, this method is non-operational. 下列 C# 程式碼會將整個 XML 輸入文件複製到主控台：The following C# code copies an entire XML input document to the console: ```csharp XmlReader reader = XmlReader.Create(myfile); XmlWriter writer = XmlWriter.Create(Console.Out); writer.WriteNode(reader, false); ``` 如果您已關閉的根節點都放置在正確，下列 C# 範例會寫出該節點的文件的其他位置。If you have moved off the root node and are positioned elsewhere in the document the following C# example correctly writes out the nodes. ```csharp XmlReader reader = XmlReader.Create(myfile); reader.Read(); // Read PI reader.Read(); // Read Comment reader.Read(); // Read DOCType XmlWriter writer = XmlWriter.Create(Console.Out); while (!reader.EOF){ writer.WriteNode(reader, false); } ``` 如果讀取器設定為會傳回空白字元，而且寫入器已設定為縮排輸出，`WriteNode`可能會產生奇怪的輸出。If the reader is configured to return white space and the writer has is configured to indent output, `WriteNode` may produce strange output. 您實際上將得到雙精度浮點格式。You will essentially be getting double formatting. 這個方法的非同步版本，請參閱。For the asynchronous version of this method, see . ## Examples 下列範例會寫出至主控台的第一個和最後一個書籍節點。The following example writes the first and last book nodes out to the console. [!code-cpp[XmlWriter.WriteNode#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter.WriteNode/CPP/writenode.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlWriter.WriteNode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter.WriteNode/CS/writenode.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlWriter.WriteNode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter.WriteNode/VB/writenode.vb#1)] 此範例會使用該檔案，`books.xml`作為輸入。The example uses the file, `books.xml`, as input. [!code-xml[XmlWriter.WriteNode#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter.WriteNode/XML/books.xml#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可以用來撰寫 XML 宣告 (而非)。This method can be used to write the XML declaration (rather than ). 這可能導致錯誤寫入編碼屬性。This could result in the encoding attribute being incorrectly written. 例如，下列 C# 程式碼會產生無效的 XML 文件中，因為預設的編碼為 utf-8。For example, the following C# code would result in an invalid XML document because the default encoding is UTF-8. ```csharp XmlWriter writer = XmlWriter.Create("output.xml"); writer.WriteProcessingInstruction("xml", "version='1.0' encoding='UTF-16'"); writer.WriteStartElement("root"); writer.Close(); ``` 如果`text`是`null`或`String.Empty`，這個方法會寫入`ProcessingInstruction`沒有資料內容，例如\<？ 名稱？ >。If `text` is either `null` or `String.Empty`, this method writes a `ProcessingInstruction` with no data content, for example \. 如果文字包含無效的序列"？ >"，可以是 throw (物件) 或插入空格 」？If text contains an invalid sequence of "?>", the can either throw an ( objects) or insert a space "? > 「 若要避免撰寫不正確的 XML (所建立的物件方法)。>" to avoid writing invalid XML ( objects created by the method). 這個方法的非同步版本，請參閱。For the asynchronous version of this method, see . ## Examples 下列範例會將 XML 檔案代表活頁簿。The following example writes an XML file representing a book. remarks.format: ## Remarks 寫入器實作的方式取決於文件的編碼方式的層級。The encoding level of the document is determined by how the writer is implemented. 例如，如果中指定物件`XmlTextWriter`建構函式，這會決定編碼屬性的值。For example, if an object is specified in the `XmlTextWriter` constructor, this determines the value of the encoding attribute. 這個方法不會建立獨立屬性。This method does not create a standalone attribute. 當`WriteStartDocument`呼叫寫入器會驗證您要撰寫是否格式正確的 XML 文件。When `WriteStartDocument` is called the writer validates that what you are writing is a well-formed XML document. 例如，它會檢查 XML 宣告，第一個節點，其中，只能有一個根層級項目存在，以此類推。For example, it checks that the XML declaration is the first node, that one and only one root-level element exists, and so on. 如果未呼叫此方法，則寫入器會假設正在寫入的 XML 片段，並不套用任何根層級的規則。If this method is not called, the writer assumes an XML fragment is being written and applies no root level rules. 如果`WriteStartDocument`已經呼叫，然後方法可用來建立另一個 XML 宣告，將會擲回例外狀況。If `WriteStartDocument` has been called and then the method is used to create another XML declaration, an exception will be thrown. 這個方法的非同步版本，請參閱。For the asynchronous version of this method, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `WriteString` 會執行下列動作：`WriteString` does the following: - 字元`&`， `<`，和`>`會取代`&`， `<`，和`>`分別。The characters `&`, `<`, and `>` are replaced with `&`, `<`, and `>`, respectively. - 預設行為使用建立會擲回時嘗試寫入的字元值範圍從 0 x-0x1F （不含空白字元 0x9、 0xA 和為 0xD） 中。The default behavior of an created using is to throw an when attempting to write character values in the range 0x-0x1F (excluding white space characters 0x9, 0xA, and 0xD). 可以寫入這些無效的 XML 字元，藉由建立與屬性設定為`false`。These invalid XML characters can be written by creating the with the property set to `false`. 這樣會導致數字字元實體所取代的字元 (（& s)\#0; 透過 & #0x1F)。Doing so will result in the characters being replaced with numeric character entities (&\#0; through �x1F). 此外，以建立`new`運算子將會使用數字字元實體無效的字元取代預設值。Additionally, an created with the `new` operator will replace the invalid characters with numeric character entities by default. **請注意**Microsoft 不會鼓勵寫入無效的 XML 字元，因為許多取用 XML 的應用程式並非設計來處理無效的字元的作法。**Note** Microsoft does not encourage the practice of writing invalid XML characters since many applications that consume XML are not designed to handle invalid characters. - 如果`WriteString`呼叫在屬性值的內容中，以取代 double 和單一引號`"`和`'`分別。If `WriteString` is called in the context of an attribute value, double and single quotes are replaced with `"` and `'` respectively. 這在輸入字串，例如`testtest`寫出做為For example, this input string `testtest` is written out as ``` test<item>test ``` 如果`text`是`null`或`String.Empty`，這個方法會寫入任何資料內容與文字節點。If `text` is either `null` or `String.Empty`, this method writes a text node with no data content. 這個方法的非同步版本，請參閱。For the asynchronous version of this method, see . ## Examples 下列範例會寫入 XML 節點。The following example writes an XML node. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法僅適用於使用 utf-16 編碼的系統上。This method is only applicable on systems that use UTF-16 encoding. 以十六進位格式寫入 surrogate 字元實體。The surrogate character entity is written in hexadecimal format. Surrogate 字元的範圍是以 #x10FFFF #x 10000。The range for surrogate characters is #x10000 to #x10FFFF. 下列公式用來產生 surrogate 字元實體: (`highChar` -0xD800) \* 0x400 + (`lowChar` -0xDC00) + 0x10000The following formula is used to generate the surrogate character entity: (`highChar` -0xD800) \* 0x400 + (`lowChar` -0xDC00) + 0x10000 HTML 和 XML 文件的字元集 （以及數字字元參考的標記法） 根據 UCS [ISO 10646]。For both HTML and XML, the document character set (and therefore the notation of numeric character references) is based on UCS [ISO-10646]. 來源文件中的單一數字字元參考可能因此在某些情況下對應到兩個 16 位元單位數 （為高 surrogate 和低 surrogate） 的字串。A single numeric character reference in a source document may therefore in some cases correspond to two 16-bit units in a string (a high surrogate and a low surrogate). 這些 16 位元的單位稱為 「 surrogate 字組 」。These 16-bit units are referred to as a surrogate pair. 如需有關 (instance) 或字元的詳細資訊，請參閱的區段 3.7 Unicode standard 3.0/Unicode 2.0 位於http://www.unicode.org，2.2 小節 W3C XML 1.0 版建議事項位於或http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml#charsets。For more information regarding surrogates or characters, refer to section 3.7 of the Unicode 3.0/Unicode 2.0 standard located at http://www.unicode.org, or section 2.2 of the W3C XML 1.0 Recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml#charsets. 這個方法的非同步版本，請參閱。For the asynchronous version of this method, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法接受 common language runtime (CLR) 簡單類型值、 將它們轉換成其字串表示法，根據 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 資料類型轉換規則，以及使用縮小寫入方法。The method accepts common language runtime (CLR) simple-typed values, converts them to their string representations according to the XML schema definition language (XSD) data type conversion rules, and writes them out by using the method. 這可讓您管線與最小重新剖析額外負荷傳遞之間的資料時的簡單型別值， ，和物件。This enables you to pipeline simple-type values with minimal reparsing overhead when passing data between , , and objects. 這項功能時也很有用處理 CLR 簡單類型和執行個體。This ability is also useful when dealing with CLR simple-types and an instance. 您可以呼叫方法寫入具類型的值，而非使用中的方法類別，以寫出之前，將具類型的資料轉換成字串值。You can call the method to write the typed value instead of using the methods in the class to convert the typed data to a string value before writing it out. 非同步作業，將轉換的傳回值到字串，使用方法。For asynchronous operations, convert the return value of to a string and use the method. 下表顯示的預設 XSD 資料型別對應至 CLR 型別。The following table shows the default XSD data types that correspond to CLR types. 如果 CLR 物件是清單型別 (如 、 或 )，則會將其視為數值型別的陣列。If the CLR object is a list type, such as , , or , it is treated as an array of the value type. |CLR 類型CLR type|預設的 XSD 資料類型Default XSD data type| |--------------|---------------------------| ||xsd:booleanxsd:boolean| |**|xsd:integerxsd:integer| | 陣列 array|xsd:base64Binaryxsd:base64Binary| |**|xsd:stringxsd:string| ||xsd:dateTimexsd:dateTime| ||xsd:decimalxsd:decimal| ||xsd:doublexsd:double| |**|xsd:integerxsd:integer| ||xsd:integerxsd:integer| ||xsd:integerxsd:integer| ||xsd:floatxsd:float| ||xsd:stringxsd:string| ||xsd:stringxsd:string| ||xsd:base64Binaryxsd:base64Binary| **這些型別與 CLS 不相容。**These types are not CLS-compliant. 不會具有對應的方法。They do not have corresponding methods. 如果連續多次呼叫 ，則不會使用空格分隔各個值。If is called multiple times in succession, the values are not delimited by a space. 您必須在呼叫 之間呼叫 ，以插入泛空白字元。You must call between calls to to insert white space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會採用 common language runtime 物件，並將輸入的值轉換成使用 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 資料類型轉換規則所需的輸出類型。This method takes the common language runtime object and converts the input value to the desired output type using the XML Schema definition language (XSD) data type conversion rules. 呼叫 方法時， 會根據 XML 結構描述 (XSD) 資料型別規則將值轉換成其字串表示，並使用 方法將其寫出。When the method is called, the converts the value to its string representations according to the XML Schema (XSD) data type rules and writes it out using the method. 如果連續多次呼叫 ，則不會使用空格分隔各個值。If is called multiple times in succession, the values are not delimited by a space. 您必須在呼叫 之間呼叫 ，以插入泛空白字元。You must call between calls to to insert white space. 傳遞至陣列型別多載以寫出相異值的陣列。Pass an array type to the overload to write out an array of distinct values. 如果此方法會在呼叫純文字，具類型的值序列化成文字，該輸出執行個體。If this method is called on an instance that outputs text-only, the typed value is serialized to text. 非同步作業，將這個方法的傳回值轉換為字串，並使用方法。For asynchronous operations, convert the return value of this method to a string and use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會採用 common language runtime 物件，並將輸入的值轉換成使用 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 資料類型轉換規則所需的輸出類型。This method takes the common language runtime object and converts the input value to the desired output type using the XML Schema definition language (XSD) data type conversion rules. 呼叫 方法時， 會根據 XML 結構描述 (XSD) 資料型別規則將值轉換成其字串表示，並使用 方法將其寫出。When the method is called, the converts the value to its string representations according to the XML Schema (XSD) data type rules and writes it out using the method. 如果連續多次呼叫 ，則不會使用空格分隔各個值。If is called multiple times in succession, the values are not delimited by a space. 您必須在呼叫 之間呼叫 ，以插入泛空白字元。You must call between calls to to insert white space. 傳遞至陣列型別多載以寫出相異值的陣列。Pass an array type to the overload to write out an array of distinct values. 如果此方法會在呼叫純文字，具類型的值序列化成文字，該輸出執行個體。If this method is called on an instance that outputs text-only, the typed value is serialized to text. 非同步作業，將這個方法的傳回值轉換為字串，並使用方法。For asynchronous operations, convert the return value of this method to a string and use the method.
